title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2019 Genesis 0.1 LTC "Crypto Poker Night", alloy, ICG MS 67*Loaded: https://chainz.cryptoid.info/ltc/address.dws?LWUdb3DSnw8oVRKvXVsjnFge6hdjHdKcpa.htmLOT 2: 2020 ClayCast Crypto 0.1 LTC "L" silver square, ICG AU50*Loaded: https://chainz.cryptoid.info/ltc/address.dws?MSgxB5RfPiEL6K3HDjSLBw9Xxx7u2z8zNb.htmLOT 3: 2013 CryptoVest 1 LTC "LSN49U6o", alloy*Not loaded, comes with QR code slipLOT 4: 2013 CryptoVest 1 LTC Special First Edition #503 "LT8uy1ba", alloy*Not loaded, comes with dual COA papersSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 11th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Lot 1 .002Wow, I have never seen lot 1 & 2 before. What are the mintages on these? Steeley

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on October 07, 2022, 06:19:28 PMLot 1 .002Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 07, 2022, 12:42:39 AMLot 2:  0.0005Current high bidsQuote from: Steeley on October 07, 2022, 06:19:28 PMWow, I have never seen lot 1 & 2 before. What are the mintages on these? LOT 1, I want to say 50 were made.. I can check with wheelz on that oneThey were made for a collectors/poker-pro game that was held in Vegas, June 2019Of note, Scott Blumstein, a WSOP champ, who was featured in the 2018 Topps Allen & Ginter set was there There were also a run of Polymerbit notes made for this event. plus the winners of the poker game got got an additional Polymerbit note corresponding to their winning position (1st-4th)LOT 2, I think only a few... ClayCast gave these as a thank you/gift in certain orders.Other than this one up for auction, have seen 2x others: 1x LTC and 1x BTC
